revision.text:
<!--농구_선수_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = BasketballPlayer
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 리그 | ontologyProperty = league }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 등번호 | ontologyProperty = number }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 선수명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 포지션 | ontologyProperty = position }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 몸무게 | ontologyProperty = weight }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소속팀 | ontologyProperty = team }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 신장 | ontologyProperty = height }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전 소속팀 | ontologyProperty = formerTeam }}
end}}
